title: Minimizing League of Legends does not work properly.
body:
I am using Windows 10, and option 'Borderless full screen'.
It always worked fine, I could minimize the game, and see the desktop, write to my friends on the client while the game is loading, etc.

Right now, when I minimize, instead, basically nothing happens, except the game 'Freezes' like a screenshot, until I maximize it again. I can't see desktop, nor taskbar... I really like borderless fullscreen, but this is such a pain I can no longer use it.

I am unsure if the latest november windows update caused it, because I am on-and-off player, but it is likely.

replies.body: The recent Windows 10 may have caused this, in fact!  The recent update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing this exact kind of freezing for some players.  Disabling it should fix this up!
